thread.section_title: Latest in Anime News by Crunchyroll!
thread.title: Kadokawa Research: Japanese Fans' Most Anticipated TV Anime of Spring 2017
thread.title_full: Kadokawa Research: Japanese Fans' Most Anticipated TV Anime of Spring 2017

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: Kadokawa Research: Japanese Fans' Most Anticipated TV Anime of Spring 2017
text:
Kadokawa has revealed the top 20 list from its recent research on the spring 2017 TV anime shows that are scheduled to premiere from late March to early April in Japan. As with the previous survey, it was conducted with 13,078 people (male:7,738, female: 5,340) at the age of 5-69 years who live in 47 prefectures via its eb-i Xpress service on February 27 and 28. Check the top 20 most anticipated titles below.  
  
 
1. "Attack on Titan Season 2"    (April 1)

© Hajime Isayama, Kodansha/"Attack on Titan" Production Committee 
   
2. "Warau Salesman NEW" (April 3)

© Fujiko Studio/"Warau Salesman NEW" Production Committee 
 
3. "Natsume's Book of Friends 6th Season" (April 11) 

(C) Yuki Midorikawa. Hakusensha/"Natsume's Book of Friends 6th Season" Production Committee 
 
4. "sin Nanatsu no Taizai" (April 14)

© HOBBY JAPAN,Niθ/"sin Nanatsu no Taizai" Partners 
 
5. "Berserk 2nd season" (April 7)

© KENTAROU MIURA (STUDIO GAGA) HAKUSENSHA.BERSERK PARTNERSHIP 
 
6. "My Hero Academia 2nd Season" (March 25)
7. "RINNE 3rd Season" (April 8)
8. "Boruto-Naruto Next Generations-" (April 5)
9. "The Eccentric Family 2 " (April 9)
10. "Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend Flat" (April 13)
 
11. "Eromanga Sensei" (April 8)
12. "Sword Oratoria" (April 14)
13. "Grimoire of Zero" (April 10)
14. "The Idolm@ster Cinderella Girls Theater" (April 4)
15. "Aikatsu Stars! 2nd Season" (April)
 
16. "Atom The Beginning" (April 15)
17. "Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS" (May) 
18. "Rage of Bahamut: Virgin Soul" (April 7)
19. "Shumatsu Nani Shitemasu ka? Isogashii Desu ka? Sukutte Moratte Ii Desu ka?" (April 11)
20. "GRANBLUE FANTASY The Animation" (April 1)
 
 
Male Top 5
1. "Attack on Titan Season 2"    
2. "Warau Salesman NEW"  
3. "sin Nanatsu no Taizai"  
4. "Natsume's Book of Friends 6th Season"  
4. "Berserk 2nd season"  
 
Female Top 5
1. "Attack on Titan Season 2"    
2. "Natsume's Book of Friends 6th Season"  
3. "Warau Salesman NEW"  
4. "RINNE 3rd Season"  
5. "sin Nanatsu no Taizai"  
 
 
Source: Kadokawa press release
